ThingDef.label: display cabinet
ThingDef.description: A display cabinet that can store up to 8 different items.

ThingDef.label: narrow display cabinet
ThingDef.description: A narrow display cabinet that can store up to 4 different items.

ThingDef.label: food shelf
ThingDef.description: A sturdy shelf capable of holding all kinds of foodstuffs and plant matter. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

ThingDef.label: double chest fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 6 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C.

ThingDef.label: single chest fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 3 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C.

ThingDef.label: corpse fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 20 corpses. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C.

ThingDef.label: large standing fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 10 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C.

ThingDef.label: standing fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 2 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C.

ThingDef.label: counter fridge
ThingDef.description:
A food roller suitable for outdoor use, designed to refrigerate held food items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 6

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: double wall fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 6 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C. Cannot support the roof.

ThingDef.label: single wall fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge that can freeze up to 3 items. Does not function in temperatures above 100°C. Cannot support the roof.

ThingDef.label: medicine cabinet
ThingDef.description:
A compact shelf designed to hold medicine, body parts, drugs, and plant matter. Items stored inside will not rot over time and have no impact on the beauty of their surroundings, as long as it's powered. 

<color=#E5E54C>Storage stats:</color> Stack size total: 36 Stack per tile: 18 Allowed items: Medicine, Plant Matter, Drugs, Neutroamine, Body parts, Medical equipment 

<color=#0094FF>Items stored can be frozen when powered.</color>

ThingDef.label: metal crate
ThingDef.description: A crate that can hold up to 12 different items.

ThingDef.label: metal crates
ThingDef.description: A large stack of metal crate that can store a range of items and is inflammable. Items stored inside will never deteriorate, burn, and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nTotal Capacity: 96

ThingDef.label: metal crates
ThingDef.description: A stack of metal crates that can store a range of items and is inflammable. Items stored inside will never deteriorate, burn, and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nTotal Capacity: 64

ThingDef.label: metal crates
ThingDef.description:
A small pile of metal crates that can store a range of items and is inflammable. Items stored inside will never deteriorate, burn, and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 40

Rotate to change appearance.

ThingDef.label: metal crate
ThingDef.description: A metal crate meant to store commonly used crafting and building materials. Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.\n\nThis building has content-specific textures.

ThingDef.label: packaged cardboard box
ThingDef.description:
A large wrapped crate that can store a variety of items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 32

Paintable, random graphic upon placement.

ThingDef.label: pile of cardboard boxes
ThingDef.description:
A pile of densely packed cardboard boxes that can store a variety of items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 48

Random texture upon placement.

ThingDef.label: stack of cardboard boxes
ThingDef.description:
A stack of cardboard boxes that can store a variety of items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 4

Random graphic upon placement, texture updates upon second stack.

ThingDef.label: double layer rack
ThingDef.description:
A fairly large warehouse storage rack designed to store a variety of items in bulk.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 32

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: rack
ThingDef.description:
A general storage rack that can store a variety of items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 8

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: small rack
ThingDef.description:
A small general storage rack.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 2

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: medicine rack
ThingDef.description:
A medicine storage rack.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 4

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: small medicine rack
ThingDef.description:
A small medicine storage rack.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 4

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: triple layer rack
ThingDef.description:
A large warehouse storage rack designed to store a variety of bulk items.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 48

Texture updates with each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: weapon cases
ThingDef.description:
A designated spot to store a large amount of weapons.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 12

Texture updates with each weapon stored.

ThingDef.label: weapon cases
ThingDef.description:
A designated spot to store a fair amount of weapons.

Items stored inside will never deteriorate and don't affect the beauty of their surroundings.

Total Capacity: 6

Texture updates witch each stack stored.

ThingDef.label: weapon cabinet
ThingDef.description: A sturdy cabinet for storing multiple weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: mesh weapon cabinet
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity metal locker for securely storing many weapons. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
